page.title: 02ABERDOUR DESCRIPTION (CONT)
page.content: twelve squares.The rest of our area is mainly{farm land and forests.}There also a loch called{Otterston Loch}and a quarry called{Goat Quarry.}One square is almost completely made up of a small bay called{Barnhill Bay}and the one next to it is almost all water,as it is part of the{River {Forth.}There are about seven farms in our area although the ground is very hilly in most of our squares.The ground rises from almost{sea level}in the{south}to{two hundred metres}in the {north. There are two forests in our area: {Humbie Wood}and{Pinnel Wood.}Also there are four{plantations:Downans , {Moss,Bents}and{Moss Easy. Two very busy main roads run through most of our twelve squares, the{A92 which becomes the{A987.}This is the main road to{Kirkcaldy.
